website_summaries.verdict: As long as it doesn't rub against your neck, this vest is a great value for its price range and offers up to 40 lbs. of extra weight.
pros: Its simple design - a single piece with an attached belt - makes it incredibly easy to take on and off
cons: Lacks padding around the neck and shoulder area, which can put extra pressure on the shoulders and collar bones

customer_reviews.title: Overall great vest for work outs.
customer_reviews.text: This vest is Great! It works perfectly for pull ups, push-ups, lunges, etc. You will also look awesome wearing it. I wear it for almost every work out now and the materials and construction of the vest is of good quality. The only reason I give it 4 stars is because I wish I could run with it on. I went for a 2.5 mile jog and it tore me up in a couple spots where it was rubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect weight and fit. I actually took 4 of the sand weights out and it's just right. It feels just as heavy as if I was wearing my fire gear and SCBA. I plan on ordering the pads soon.
customer_reviews.author: firerescue6786

customer_reviews.title: Great vest. No regrets.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a very high quality vest. Bought the 80lb model. Nylon is strong. Sandbag pouches seem like they will last a very long time. Some people have mentioned wearing these draws attention from law enforcement. That statement is true. First time wearing it at a walking trail at a park I got stopped and questioned by a deputy and had to open the pockets and prove the contents were weighted bags. Other than that the vest is great. May order the shoulder pads later but this model really isn't bad. It's definitely a workout marching with this beast!
customer_reviews.author: Michael L

customer_reviews.title: Love it for certain workouts
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for any type of CrossFit workout that calls for a weighted vest because it is reasonably comfortable but also very easy to adjust the weights in the vest itself. The straps for tightening the vest down last and i have had no problem with them slipping off or loosening regardless of how much sweat or chalk I get inside of the velcro. I highly recommend this product for anybody who is looking to tackle a killer workout that calls for a weighted vest or even if you just want to add another degree of difficulty to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob A.

customer_reviews.title: Good Vest!
customer_reviews.text: This vest is awesome. I'm currently training my body for upcoming physical assessments and use this to step up my game. I am a 5' 5" woman with an above average sized chest and I find that this vest doesn't shift around when running or anything. It does, however, rub into my shoulders a bit when doing jumping jacks or any type of movement that involves jumping and using my arms at the same time. But, the rubbing doesn't happen when I do movements that involve jumping without the use of my arms. So, no big deal. Overall, this vest is comfortable and gets the job done. If your workouts need extra oomph, I recommend grabbing one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Leilani

customer_reviews.title: Great way to increase your workout diversity & turn normal activities into a workout
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great...I was looking for something to expand my workout regimen, and since I'm usually pressed for time, a way to convert my dog walks into a workout too. This really works and will wear you out on a 4 mile walk. Good way to keep your heart in the "fat-burning" zone, and increase your endurance. I haven't tried to run with it (and probably won't)...too many miles on the chassis already. I've taken some grief from the wife and daughter for looking like a suicide bomber, but the neighbors haven't commented (to my face anyway).
customer_reviews.author: Greg S.

customer_reviews.title: Smells weird but does the job!
customer_reviews.text: This vest is really great. Sturdy, easy to put on and off, and adjustable so you can wear it loose or tight. The only catch is that the sand weights inside the vest smell really strongly of fishy cat food when I first got it. My cats love it! Me? Not so much. I don't like smelling like cat food when I start sweating during a workout. I've aired it out for a while, and the smell is almost gone completely so it's still a 5-star purchase in my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Loren Lemmond

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just got it. seems ok, but much bulkier than on the picture. will update in a month or two./ A month later update: great for walking and pullups, If you 5.7-5.8 or shorter and intend to use it for push ups, you could feel that the vest weight distribution little bit lower than should be in order to fully engage your chest and hands muscles. Otherwise, a very good quality, I use it everyday. For that price? I changing my 4 stars to 5.
customer_reviews.author: georgioA

customer_reviews.title: Great for training, pads are worth investing in.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality! I don't know what everyone is talking about with the fish smell, I received mine and there was no smell to it at all. Mostly would give this vest 5 stars, really great for training, not the best for running, especially if you are small and slender like me but i wasn't using the pads. After using the vest I wish I would have bought the pads with it, but if you aren't doing much shoulder movement or jumping/running it is decently comfortable! 4 stars for comfort. 5 stars for fit. I am 5'8 and 135lbs, female, and it fits great!
customer_reviews.author: Ciara

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vest, but beware it stinks.  BAD.
customer_reviews.text: The vest is very nice, but the SMELL. Holy crap this thing stinks! It smells like dead fish and it permeates on to your shirts and you stink. I left it in my truck and my truck now stinks. Wow. Otherwise it fits nice and is easy to adjust. Definitely worth the $49 I paid with free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: G. Kesler

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, great price, great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few different weighted vests and this one is by far my favorite! It fits perfectly and doesn’t constrict my breathing like some of the other vests can. I love the look of the vest and it is so comfortable. Once you get it fit properly it does not bounce at all while running, jumping rope, etc. I would recommend this vest to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Reuter

customer_reviews.title: Two of the weights fell out, the stitching ripped.
customer_reviews.text: I used this only a few times a month, yet in under 2 years two of the weights fell out - the stitching ripped; and the inside white plastic protective layer started flaking off getting everywhere. I have been in fitness for over 5 decades, not an amature - this vest NEVER should have falling apart like this; it seemed to just dry out in those areas. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: In My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: the shipping was funny. They used the "if it fits it ships" ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for about a year now and I have incorporated this into many of my workouts. It basically amplifies and intensifies body weight exercise and movement to the nth degree. My pull up game is incredible. My chest has gotten stronger. I ruck march with this on and it's very effective. I do not run with this on, instead I will put it on and hit the stairs for 40 minutes. On a side note, the shipping was funny. They used the "if it fits it ships" box from USPS. Poor mailman had to luck that heavy thing to my front doorstep and it WAS PACKED TIGHT. just a funny side note.
customer_reviews.author: P. Sneakers

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Really nice sturdy quality. The weights seem to be sand bags you can remove them from the pockets. The Velcro stays nice. Does have a tiny bit of a weird smell I get every once in awhile but not bad. It does bounce around alittle I don't think it would be super comfortable to run in if you tighten it you could make it work. Good product
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Green

customer_reviews.title: Make Everything Strength Training!
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other weighted vests I've tried, this one is very comfortable and closes snugly. Mobility is excellent. Makes housework super fun. Makes walks with the kids even more fun. Makes dinner taste very good indeed. I only wish our society were more tolerant so that I could wear this everywhere. That's where you come in :)
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great vest and great value!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I always look for value and quality when shopping. Aa a fitness nut and serious competitor I looked at this vest for a long time before buying. That...is my only regret. This vest is simply awesome. Equally weighted, great material, and robust construction. People at my gym have been in awe of my vest. Additionally, there was a shipping issue, but when I contacted the seller they fixed the issue immediately. I rarely write reviews and this is a first for five stars. We'll done!
customer_reviews.author: Russell Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Remarkable
customer_reviews.text: Weighted vest training is remarkable. I use it rollerblading to reduce the risk of knee and hip problems. I am not sure if I would run in one of these. The 20lb version maybe, but I have a 60lb one as well that would be an incredible amount of stress on your joints doing higher impact things.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P. Grotenhuis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home workout!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to do some HIIT workouts at home when I don't have the time after work to go to the gym. I have to say that its a fairly good quality vest for the price. Definitely a good value. The weights that came with it slide perfect into the slots and only thing I'd say is it gets a bit uncomfortable after a bit but thats a given with 20-60lbs on the vest. All in all a very good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Erik T

customer_reviews.title: Cool, at first
customer_reviews.text: I was waiting to see what the quality was like for this vest. At the time of writing this, the straps no longer hold. The Velcro is missing teeth now, and, the bags have started to separate and leave puddles of sand. It’s finely ground, so, it gets everywhere. Admittedly, the vest worked great for about 6 months. I would take it out and use it at the gym, leave it packed in my car when not in use. And it STILL started to deteriorate. If you need a short term solution, sure. But, I did not get long term use. It’s more of an annoyance to use than not.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: It fits!
customer_reviews.text: 5'4" 149lbs Purchased the 60lb vest. I was concerned that this might be too long, it's not. It's just right actually. It does hit the collar bone a bit. I'll probably just tuck an infant sock under that bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great range of motion
customer_reviews.text: I like this vest because it actually stays on while you run. I’ve been using it for over the course of the month and it really works you out. Has been making me sore and I like it. I bought the 20 pound vest and it was worth it. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile and easy to use. Only negative about it is that the shoulder trim digs into your shoulder, making it slightly uncomfortable. A man may fill this out better than a woman. But I've used this for running, walking, push ups, etc. It's just best to use a shirt or tank top underneath it or else it may cause minor chaffing.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: CROSS101 adjustable cammo print Weight Vest
customer_reviews.text: There are few weight vest that serve their true purpose and the Cross101 is one of them. Not only can it be used for CrossFit (hence the name) but not for me, it's comfortable enough for outdoor walking or running and inside the gym on the treadmill or doing other cardio and body weight exercises that I use it for. All in all its a great vest.
customer_reviews.author: BLD1057

customer_reviews.title: I didn't see how much I'd love it. It must have been the camouflage.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for the Murph Challenge 2017. It's comfortable when worn over a t-shirt, no chaffing of any kind. Fits close and secure. Great price compared to a lot of the other options too!
customer_reviews.author: David A Enriquez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take on and off.
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by a friend who does Crossfit. I go to an interval class; this vest works well as it is very easy to take on and off which I found I needed to do at heavy weights; too much stress on joints when running and jumping rope. However it was ideal for squats, lunges, push ups...
customer_reviews.author: Arinbiorn

customer_reviews.title: As advertised - but tough to wear for long periods of time
customer_reviews.text: It is a weighted vest, similar to a "rucksack" a soldier might train with. It's strong, sturdy, easy to adjust weights, but at full capacity a little hard on the collarbone, and I'm left with questions of how to keep it smelling clean. But for a simple adjustable weighted vest, it is as advertised. Just be sure you are ready for the work that comes with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good weight distribution
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Came back very satisfied after my 2 miles walk today. Weight distribution has help me a lot. I have ankle and back pain but didn’t feel any major discomfort during my little walk. Yes I definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Khadidjaz Dia

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have anything to compare this to, as this is my first weighted vest. It was comfortable to run in (as comfortable as expected!) & I like how adjustable it is; I was able to get it pretty snug (I’m a size 4-6). It did mark my collar bone, but I tend to bruise fairly easily at CrossFit normally.
customer_reviews.author: ashley t.

customer_reviews.title: Great vest
customer_reviews.text: Nice vest, distributes weight through out upper body just right. Haven’t had it dig into my shoulders like others have mentioned yet. Overall I’m very impressed with this vets and the camo design is cool.
customer_reviews.author: FireMedic2

customer_reviews.title: Vest + Shoulder pads = a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Talk about a workout. Try working out with a 40lb vest on. It will make you sweat!!! It’s not very comfortable and some workouts you will not be able to perform while wearing this. But overall it’s definitely a great buy! Make sure you order the shoulder pads with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Really great construction, military look
customer_reviews.text: Really great construction, military look, and the delivery was very fast. I am a CrossFit athlete and this is perfect for adding that extra weight resistance for the WODs. Ive read a lot of comments concerning running with this on. A weighted vest of this type of construction and caliber is not meant to be worn for running...its for weight/resistance training. So yes, you will get blisters, and bad skin rubs etc if you run in this. The vest, however, is great for walking and hiking.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL E.

customer_reviews.title: Good fitness gear
customer_reviews.text: I’d have to say I’m very pleased with the weight vest . I was a little skeptical at first but it reminds me a lot of the plate carrier I had in the army. I highly recommend. It’s very adjustable to different body styles and is made of a good material
customer_reviews.author: Javin Pul.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Got the 60 lbs version and seems well made and fits me for stairs or a hike but would not run in it
customer_reviews.author: Racerx

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: GREAT BUT GET THE SHOULDER PADS/INSERTS BECAUSE THE KILL AFTER A LONG WORKOUT OR RUN ALSO CHAFFED A LIL ON MY NECK THE FIRST FEW TIMES BUT I DID RUN WITH ALL 40 POUNDS SO I'M SURE THAT'S WHY
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this vest, other than the pressure it puts on your shoulders, which is uncomfortable. I duct taped the shoulder straps to make them thinner, which takes the weight off a bit. Great quality otherwise, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ARef

customer_reviews.title: Son of a b*tch!
customer_reviews.text: This vest is a son of a b*tch! This will definitely take your cardio to the next level and I love pushing myself with it. Makes for a brutal workout and surprisingly comfortable for being a heavy weighted vest. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Eric G.

customer_reviews.title: Great workout tool
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my workout whenever I can. I love how it pushes my workouts harder than I would do on my own and I can see the difference in my strength levels once I'm done using it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Great for the basics but too front heavy for agility
customer_reviews.text: It definitely fits well, but is a bit awkward with agility movements. Wish more weight was focused towards the back because it feels front heavy. If you are looking to do basic movements with this vest such as pullups pushups etc, this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Really well made weight vest.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson for Christmas present and he really liked it - could move well with it and felt it quite comfortable
customer_reviews.author: G Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome with good quality. The only thing I don't like is the bottle carrier on the front can get in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Lovelace

customer_reviews.title: Effective, but....
customer_reviews.text: The vest does what it says it will do, but I feel it's over priced. It lacks in shoulder padding and gets uncomfortable after extended wear. It came with a weird smell and has yet to fade out after a month of use. Overall it does the job I need it for but could be improved with a few minor changes.
customer_reviews.author: Verified Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Have used the vest a couple times to add weight ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used the vest a couple times to add weight to my work outs. The 40lbs is a lot to get used to hanging on you shoulders but you kind of forget about it. It only got 4 stars cause it's still listed with iron weights but comes with sand weights, but I kind of knew that cause one of the questions answered stated it comes with sand. But to me it still warranted a loss of a star
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Vest
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband and it’s fantastic. Has pockets so you can put a drink bottle and phone and it’s got a great design and he uses it a lot for running and training.
customer_reviews.author: Susie G

customer_reviews.title: Really well made!
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy. It creates a tough workout. I hate it, but I love it. I would buy again based on the quality, easy to put on and easy to remove weights
customer_reviews.author: Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great vest for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this vest. all weights come out, so you can build your way up. I am 6 feet and 175lbs and this fits well. it does slide off a little if you do sit-ups in it- but not a big deal!
customer_reviews.author: Swaroop

customer_reviews.title: Wrap weight bags in duct tape
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the vest is great. Snug fit and doesn't shift around on me during push-ups, pull-ups, etc. The only downfall of this vest is that the width of the shoulder straps causes discomfort when doing close grip pull-ups (Not a deal breaker at all). To ensure that the weights don't "leak" overtime, I wrapped each weight bag in duct tape. It's nearly indestructible now.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Kiely

customer_reviews.title: Seems like its quality made, but bulky
customer_reviews.text: It's a little more bulky than I had expected. I'm 5'8" about 155lbs, the top of the weight pockets are about at my nipples and go down to my waist. Hits my legs when I squat. Seems like its quality made. I like doing pull ups with it, but with pushups the weights stop me from going all the way down. I was hoping to run or bike it it, but it's unlikely that I will.
customer_reviews.author: Loki

customer_reviews.title: Fits great even on a big guy like me!
customer_reviews.text: I am a big dude (6’1 260) and this vest fits great! I use it to do brisk walking around my neighborhood where it is very hilly and it is a tremendous workout. It doesn’t smell at all, dries out easily and even repels rain when exercising outdoors in bad weather. I am looking for similar style camo ankle and wrist weights to up my cardio resistance but the 20 lb vest is perfect! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weights are adjustable, straps are NOT.
customer_reviews.text: Very cool vest but the shoulders are not adjustable. That means the weight is concentrated (for me on my build) very high on the neck/collar and less spread through out the width of the shoulder strap as it should be. If you buy it, just know that you'll have to put something under the straps to spread out the load.
customer_reviews.author: DPM

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! This is a durable, heavy duty vest. This is well worth the money,in glad I bought it. Easy to get on and off, velcro on the sides allow me to adjust as necessary. The weights are easy to take out and put back. I threw this is the washing machine to clean it. Durable for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Lmeast Slacka

customer_reviews.title: Super solid weight vest
customer_reviews.text: This vest is awesome! Feels sturdy. It doesn't sag of bounce to much at all and fits great. I'm a fit 190lbs and this things feels like it was made for me. If I had any complaint it would be that the weight pouches seem a bit fragile (housed in plastic). I haven't had any issues, but I would recommend storing them off the ground or something. If my dog walked over one I could see them getting punctured. Would totally recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: T Holz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and stay in place while running, doing burpees and rope climbing...perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Love the strap to hold tight and the camo makes me feel like a badass!
customer_reviews.author: Carson Clow

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, quality product
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this for training and he finds it very comfortable and well constructed. Very easy to change the weight and keep distribution even on front and back. It lifts over the head then straps around the torso and he has little trouble putting it on by himself.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hettler

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot and it feels great. I can’t say I have one issue with this. Great product
customer_reviews.author: joshua

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome!!! I feel like a bada**! The weight is great. Pushups with 20-28 pounds. Just walking around with it feels great. I have not ran with it. I'd for sure want to put a decent shirt under to help my shoulders and neck. Id probably put something over it too if I was going outside. It's a little terrorist looking. But I still like it.
customer_reviews.author: rob miller

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: It came as expected, and it seems to be very durable. I would recommend it highly. If I had to pick one negative thing, it’s a little rough on the shoulders, but just a little pad under it and ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: ehh
customer_reviews.text: holds to much heat between the vest and your body. uncomfortable on the shoulders. MRI is better.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and functionality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and functionality for the price. Would really recommend considering where you will be using this though before purchasing due to the natural look of the vest being very suspicious for the casual person passing by. Aside from that, the weight sits pretty much on your traps and tends to rub a little around the neck/collar bone; however, after a few times training with it I didn't notice it too much.
customer_reviews.author: Mauk

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat it!
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research leading up to this purchase and I made the right decision with this vest. It’s as comfortable as a weighted vest can be, it doesn’t move much while running or doing body weight movements. I’ve only used it a handful of times but nothing but positive feelings thus far
customer_reviews.author: Gianna Trombino

customer_reviews.title: Quite satisfied ...
customer_reviews.text: Positives: Fits well, easy to adjust the weights, very sturdy. Negatives: Needs more cushioning under the shoulders and does look like a suicide bomber vest. Feel uncomfortable going around in public with this considering how paranoid everyone is these days. Just use it on my treadmill. That being said, very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey51

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Great product - perfect for taking weight off of hands for lunges.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Dietz

customer_reviews.title: Only good for vertical exercises- not push-ups, bear crawls, etc
customer_reviews.text: I’ll keep it short and simple: running is nearly impossible for any distance in this vest due to violent bouncing in your shoulders, you can’t do anything like bear crawls or else the Velcro will come undone- the Velcro is very cheap and does not hold on for long while doing horizontal things like pushups. Only think I can do correctly with this vest is pull-ups.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel B.

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: It is bulkier than I would like, however it was a good price for this type of product. I use it for cardio training (stair master, road bike ect.) I like that I can adjust the weight and slowly work my way up to the 40lbs. I feel like it is a good vest.
customer_reviews.author: R. M. Shanika

customer_reviews.title: this is a very sturdy vest made of thick heavy duty nylon and straps ...
customer_reviews.text: My son is going into the Marines shortly, and during his PT as a Poolee he does a lot of hikes, this is a very sturdy vest made of thick heavy duty nylon and straps snugly into place, especially around the waist. He is able to jog with his jogging partner (Maverick, our Airedale Terrier) and it works great, probably best to put 2 t-shirts on as it does rub on the shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it primarily to do the Murph which involves a lot of continuous movements and running, which worked out awesome! The only thing I would recommend is adding a piece of Velcro to the flap where your phone/music device because it flops while running. Isn’t that big of a deal but more of annoying than anything. Aside from that great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He is a thin young man and needs the extra weight when he is relying on body weight to do exercises like pull ups and push ups
customer_reviews.text: I made sure to buy my son the exact weight belt that his friend has and he loves it. He is a thin young man and needs the extra weight when he is relying on body weight to do exercises like pull ups and push ups. He says it is comfortable and easy to adjust the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Valbear

customer_reviews.title: it can add intensity to most workouts easily, to this day it still looking brand new ...
customer_reviews.text: it can add intensity to most workouts easily, to this day it still looking brand new and I use it in moderation (1-2) times a week it can be a hassle getting the weights in and out of the pockets I guess which is the only con I could imagine. Its price is easily justified by its utility
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin Perez

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and is versatile
customer_reviews.text: This vest met my expectations and does exactly what I need it to do: Add further punishment to my aging body!
customer_reviews.author: I. Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Great Vest!
customer_reviews.text: I use this vest for calisthenics workouts. Fits great and the weight is distributed evenly. Will certainly help with the GAINS!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For those getting after it
customer_reviews.text: No complaints after a month of using the 40 lb vest for running, pull ups, push ups, dips, and everything in between. Zero complains. Im 225 lbs at 5'11 and fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P

customer_reviews.title: We love it.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend and now even more than ever, this guy is ready to work out. We were expecting to receive this vest tomorrow, Monday, but we got it yesterday, Saturday. Quick delivery and her gets what he needs with his work outs. By the way.. he's very muscularly built, 280 and 5'10. Fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: This vest fits great. I am 5'7" and have worn this vest at 140-156lbs. I am able to climb stairs and do full squats with it on. It does wear my shirts sometimes, I ruined one of my favorite shirts trying to climb 80 floors wearing this vest but I imagine any vest is going to rub a little.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, tough
customer_reviews.text: Well-made product. I like that there are multiple weights so you can increase or decrease resistance from workout to workout. Fit is snug. Vest retains heat so you get hot but you are working out so I expect to get hot.
customer_reviews.author: Trenton Nishibun

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great vest. A bit of padding on the shoulders would make it even better but not a big deal. It doesn’t cause chafing under the armpits or arms, it’s very comfortable. Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and take off
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and take off. I just wish it had more cushion on the shoulder area.It pushes on my shoulders a bit and gets annoying.Nothing to stop me from wearing it. I hated the way ankle weights felt, and this has been much much better for me.It also looks nice.Makes you feel like you`re going to war.Only nobody getting killed just my body as I work out.
customer_reviews.author: Truth

customer_reviews.title: Nice weighted vest
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this weighted vest for some time now. Very nice quality and the weights are easy to put in and take out as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well made and a great price too.
customer_reviews.text: You have to get it tight enough to wear it won’t bounce but loose enough to where you can expand your lungs during a tough WOD. The value of this vest and the Quality of it are unparalleled. Skip the expensive 511 vest and get this one. (It’s even got a pocket for your phone and a water bottle holder... seriously it’s awesome)
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Train hard
customer_reviews.text: Very well made product.Easy to use and recommended for push ups, squats ,an roller add on,etc.If you want to use it for running or cardio ,I highly recommend buying the neoprene T-shirt to avoid chaffing and increase work out, efficiency. Buy it.Amazing price and flawless Amazon delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Q

customer_reviews.title: Beast vest and fits snug
customer_reviews.text: Beast!!!! What a difference 20 lbs makes. Wear during cardio and walks and absolutely kicks my butt. Fits snug, but I haven't run in it yet, so I don't know if it bounces around.
customer_reviews.author: john Williams

customer_reviews.title: It smells super weird, but it serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this weighted vest. He wears it during workouts to add to his body weight wods. It smells super weird, but it serves its purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Peyton

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: well made product, great price, I like that you can take the weight out as needed (front and back)
customer_reviews.author: Joanie

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR WORKOUTS!!! or just walks with added resistance
customer_reviews.text: I have used it few times, planning to use it more in few weeks, hoefully the weather gets better. It is good quality, good weight and it stays snugg, but if you are a heavy breather, your chest might not be able to exapnd as much due to the tightness from the vest... but that is not an issue as it can be adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: 1Sys

customer_reviews.title: GREATNESS
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. A tad stiff, but if it’s supposed to be durable, expect a little stiffness. I don’t want to be jogging in tissue paper. Awesome reply time too! I stupidly ordered the artic color, when I live in Florida so I had to do a return. Painless. Thanks guys!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Very good weighted vest for the money.
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to beat this vest for the price. The only thing that is a negative is the pinching feeling that is generated in the shoulder area when wearing it, but if you're only using it for a short time, it's really nothing. However, I couldn't imagine going for a run or a bike ride with this vest. Overall though, it's a great addition to my workout arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: Dave R.

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be very durable after several uses. The only complaint I have is that my shoulders get very sore from the lack of padding. I can handle the weight but my shoulders can't take more than 30 minutes of use or they just get raw.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gleason

customer_reviews.title: Great vest for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy the vest. I’m still working out the proper tightness for the mix of workout I do (HIT). Too tight, great movement but lots of pressure on my chest. Too loose, moves too much. Overall, I really like this vest and price.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Elliott

customer_reviews.title: the weights are lower than i would like on the torso
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done, the weights are lower than i would like on the torso, which feel a little awkward, but overall great price, definitely buy yourself some shoulder pads if you plan on longer workouts, the straps are gnarly when all the weights are attached
customer_reviews.author: hunter richardson

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. I recommend getting the pads. I didn't but I definitely would if i had a second chance to do so
customer_reviews.author: Thania F

customer_reviews.title: Gains
customer_reviews.text: I may look like a domestic terrorist when I walk around with this on in public but there's no other way I'd rather do my push ups, pull-ups and 69 mile runs. Buy this unless you lack the mental and physical fortitude to mold yourself into a literal god.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit well on small frames.
customer_reviews.text: When I read the reviews on this I thought it was more adjustable, especially for those of us with smaller frames and women who don’t have massive shoulders, but can carry more on our hips. Seems like no options for women who want a 40lb or 50lb vest. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Good vest
customer_reviews.text: Awesome weight vest, a lot cheaper than other vests. Probably not as comfortable as the others but it definitely does the job. Makes the workouts a lot harder.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great weight vest
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it and the weight fit well into my sandbag that I purchased separately.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Erden

customer_reviews.title: Think about the weight
customer_reviews.text: Unless you're a beast, go with the 20 pounder. I use it for my long morning walk and it adds an extra effort without discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Darpon

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, perfect for my walks
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. Fits well but I’m also wide. I have the 20 lb one and it’s fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Nice for adding a lot more weight while doing low ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice for adding a lot more weight while doing low intensity type work outs. I would not recommend doing a lot of running, jumping, or crawling since it does not stay as close to the body as I would like. When I try doing exercises like bear crawls the Velcro tends to either come loose or one up around my neck.
customer_reviews.author: stacey davis

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: Well made product. Weight system is adjustable which is great. However I had to put extra padding in the shoulders because they were digging my shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Ali H. Albayrak

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit, the shoulder straps don't dig
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit, the shoulder straps don't dig, and the side wraps are secure. The vest comes with 10 x 4-lb sand weights, so your weight adjustments are in 4-lb increments. There's enough velcro on the adjustments to accomodate a range of body sizes, so the vest doesn't slide around or shift on you during exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Avila

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed how nice this was! I have been looking at these for a long time but others seem to be too expensive for me to actually commit to buying. After receiving this one At a great price I am very happy. Very durable and fits nice and snug.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Brincefield

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, has held up well with sweat and in the rain. Weight distribution is easy to maintain if not using all the weights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: CROSS101 Weighted Vest Arctic/Desert Camouflage 20lbs - 80lbs
feature_bullets: Weights Included. 10 x 4lbs Iron Ore weights
Weights are adjustable in 4lbs Increments. Max weight is 40lbs
One piece design with belt attached onto the vest for easy setup
13-Inch in width, One size fits all
